Welcome to the era of fast and secure messaging

Weiyi delivers messages faster than
any other application

Weiyi is free forever. No ads.
No subscription fees

Weiyi keeps your messages safe
from hacker attacks

Weiyi has no limits on the size of
your media and chats

Weiyi lets you access your messages
from multiple devices

Weiyi messages are heavily encrypted
and can self-destruct
